scripts.start: echo 'Setting up Python with virtual environment...' && (apt-get update && apt-get install -y python3 python3-pip python3-venv || echo 'Failed to install Python packages') && mkdir -p /app/venv && python3 -m venv /app/venv && . /app/venv/bin/activate && pip install django==4.2.11 djangorestframework==3.14.0 gunicorn==21.2.0 && export PYTHONPATH='/app:/app/backend:$PYTHONPATH' && export DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE='expert_system.settings' && python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:$PORT || echo 'Failed to start Django server - please check deployment configuration'
